content.text: “Share exchange tender offer” means any acquisition by one corporation in exchange in whole or in part for its equity securities (or the equity securities of a corporation which is in control of the acquiring corporation) of shares of another corporation, other than an exchange reorganization (subdivision (b) of Section 181).

history: Added by Stats. 1989, Ch. 1116, Sec. 4. Effective September 30, 1989.
